import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "./contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const [submit, setSubmit] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { setSubmit((submit) => { submit(true) ? (

Thankyou for contacting us.

We are connecting to you soon.

) : (

Thankyou for contacting us.

We are connecting to you soon.

); }); }, []); return (

CONTACT

); }; export default Contact;
